component.text: Configuring a Floating Static Route to R3
Configure a Floating Static Route on R3

component.feedback: ***You must enter the exact and full command.***
component.existingcommands: Configure a default route using the next-hop address 192.168.1.2.

command.instruction: Configure a default route using the next-hop address 10.10.10.1 with an administrative distance of 5.
Exit configuration mode and display the routing table.

command.deviceresponse:
Codes: L - local, C - connected, S - static, R - RIP, M - mobile, B - BGP
D - EIGRP, EX - EIGRP external, O - OSPF, IA - OSPF inter area
N1 - OSPF NSSA external type 1, N2 - OSPF NSSA external type 2
E1 - OSPF external type 1, E2 - OSPF external type 2
i - IS-IS, su - IS-IS summary, L1 - IS-IS level-1, L2 - IS-IS level-2
ia - IS-IS inter area, * - candidate default, U - per-user static route
o - ODR, P - periodic downloaded static route, H - NHRP, l - LISP
+ - replicated route, % - next hop override

Gateway of last resort is 192.168.1.2 to network 0.0.0.0

S* 0.0.0.0/0 [1/0] via 192.168.1.2
R3#
command.instruction: You successfully configured a floating static route on R3.
